channel.title: Help With Cheat Clients
channel.description:
I apologize if this is in the wrong section.
Ok, this is the tut I used:
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/216636-only-client-can-connect-server-using-uid.html
Now I did everything and for some reason I can't even connect. What did I do wrong?
Also, I believe I may have added the UID to the client incorrectly. Can someone give me a link to a tut to adding it to the client? Thanks.
